Script.name: DaynightTracker
Script.script:
--Little daynight tracker for svo by TheLastDarkthorne function init_daynightTracker() if not svo then return end
function svo.daynightTracker_tag() local daynight = tonumber(svo.me.gametime.daynight) local moon ='ðŸŒ™' local sun ='ðŸŒž' if daynight <= 100 then return sun else return moon end
return "--" end
svo.adddefinition("@daynighttracker", "svo.daynightTracker_tag()") end
if svo and svo.adddefinition then init_daynightTracker() end if daynighttag then killAnonymousEventHandler(daynighttag) end daynighttag = registerAnonymousEventHandler("svo system loaded", init_daynightTracker)
